channel.title: 2. Amazon SageMaker and HuggingFace library on Getting Started with Amazon SageMaker Studio
channel.description: Recent content in 2. Amazon SageMaker and HuggingFace library on Getting Started with Amazon SageMaker Studio

item.title: 3.1 Train and fine-tune NLP models with SageMaker and HuggingFace library
item.description: Watch the livestream to follow along with the presenter Open the following notebook to follow along Notebook: finetuning_huggingface.ipynb A copy of the code from the notebook is also available below, if you prefer building your notebook from scratch by copy pasting each code cell and then running them. Upgrade to the latest sagemaker version. !pip install -Uq sagemaker smdebugimport ast import json import boto3 import numpy as np import pandas as pd from datetime import datetime as dt from IPython.
